events.message: I have filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle at the intersection downtown.
The submitted claim has been reviewed and categorised under auto accident based on the incident details reported.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to handle your case and will be in contact soon.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and confirm that the processing will begin shortly.
Please provide photos of the accident scene, vehicle damage, and a police report to proceed with your claim investigation.
All requested documents including police report and vehicle photos have been submitted for your auto accident claim.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing all evidence and documentation related to your car accident claim.
The investigation into your vehicle collision claim is now complete, verifying the damages and liability involved.
A settlement amount has been proposed to cover the repair costs and associated expenses from the car accident.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the support provided.
Your auto accident claim has been approved in full based on the agreed settlement and documentation presented.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount has been issued and deposited to your account successfully.
The auto accident claim file has been officially closed following the full resolution and payment.
